response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its immense worth of $1,000,000 to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to secure this invaluable asset at a considerable discount, ensuring you maximize your investment with immediate benefits. Please let me know if you require any further information or if we can arrange a time for a detailed discussion about how this product can revolutionize your business.", "product_price": 950000}
